Docs.summary: Specifies when and how a part will be instantiated.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In the course of composition, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> needs instances of the objects described by exports in order to fill imports. If a one export is used to fill multiple imports, there are two possible behaviors. Either a single instance of the exported object is created, and a reference to the same object is given to every importer, or a separate instance of the exported object is created for each importer.
Which behavior occurs depends on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute> attached to the export and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.RequiredCreationPolicy%2A> of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute>. Both of which will contain a value from the CreationPolicy enumeration. If the policies are incompatible, that export will not be considered a match for the given import. The following table summarizes the interaction of these two properties.
|<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.RequiredCreationPolicy%2A>|Export's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> specifies F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Any?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True or none specified.|Export's P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True specifies F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True|Export's P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True specifies F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Any?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True|A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.|A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.|A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.| |F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True|A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.|A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.|The export will not be considered a match for the import.| |F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True|A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.|The export will not be considered a match for the import.|A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.|

Docs.summary: Specifies that the T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True will use the most appropriate CreationPolicy for the part given the current context. This is the default CreationPolicy. By default, T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True will use F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, unless the T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True or importer requests F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
